    • Constructor Detail

      • PatternStrokeStyle

        public PatternStrokeStyle​(int factor,
                          short pattern,
                          float r,
                          float g,
                          float b,
                          float a,
                          float strokeWidth)
        Creates a new instance.
        Parameters:
        factor - The number of pixels to be drawn for each bit in the pattern
        pattern - A bitwise representation of the pixel pattern, with the least-significant bit representing the first pixel, the second least-significant bit representing the second pixel and so on
        r - The red component of the stroke color
        g - The green component of the stroke color
        b - The blue component of the stroke color
        a - The alpha component of the stroke color
        strokeWidth - The stroke width

        public long getPattern()
        Returns the pattern. The low-order 16-bits compose the pattern; other bits are ignored.
